Description: Chomp Chomp Food Centre is a great place to go for dinner with friends or family. There is a huge variety of food to choose from, and the prices are reasonable. The operating hours are Monday to Sunday, 4 pm to 12:30 am.

Place: The Shoppes at Marina Bay Sands
Description: The Shoppes at Marina Bay Sands is a great place for food, shopping, and just roaming around on the weekends. It offers a range of luxury brands, as well as a food court with affordable food choices. There is also a Marina Bay Walking and Running trial outside the shopping mall. The mall is open from 10 am to 10 pm every day.

Place: Esplanade - Theatres on the Bay, Singapore
Description: You can enjoy free outdoor performances, soak in the views from the marina bay, have dinner at one of the many great restaurants, watch a band play, take a stroll around Marina Bay, attend a concert, or visit the Youth Olympic Park. The operating hours vary depending on the event, so please check the website for more information.

You can have a romantic dinner at Pasta Bar. The restaurant has a modern and relaxed ambiance, making it a great spot for a meal with friends or family. The restaurant is open from Monday to Sunday, 6 to 11 pm, and from Thursday to Sunday, 12 to 3 pm.

Chip Bee Gardens is a restaurant with a variety of culinary options, from local to western. It has a charming atmosphere and is a great place to relax alfresco. Operating hours are not provided in the context.
You can shop, explore the many branded shops, enjoy good food and drinks, and take in the ambience. Operating hours are Monday to Sunday, 10 am to 10 pm.

East Coast Park is a great destination for outdoor activities such as cycling, rollerblading, jogging, walking, fishing, and picnicking. There are also restaurants, cafes, and hawker centers offering a variety of local and international cuisines. The park is open from 5am to 12am daily.
You can shop, dine, get a massage, or do some window shopping at Plaza Singapura. The mall is open from 10am to 10pm every day.
